Name: Mine Seeker
About the game: In Mine Seeker you are able to play a well known game in a new 3 dimensional way! Customize the Map size, choose between different locations to play in and set the difficulty by adjusting the amount of mines on the board. Be fast though because you have a maximum of 60 minutes to clear all tiles that arenÂ´t mines.
